channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for VT
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for VT

item.title: Report X-2023120951
item.description:
Report X-2023120951

Identified by scraper @ 2023-12-30T17:46:52+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-12-18
  • City: SOUTH BURLINGTON
  • State: VT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: QA could not correlate the actual damage to what was described by our package handler that saw the leaking package. PH said that he dropped it a bit too hard maybe, but the damage is to the top part of the bucket. QA Immediately picked the package up with a Hazmat bin and brought it for processing to HazMat cage. DescribePack: Dented lid on bucket. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Contained in a HazMat bin with appropriate safety precautions and cleaned up with Absorbent Pads.
